title: We Are All One: A call to spiritual uprising
description: Allbooks International Editor's Choice Award 2009 winner in the Spirituality & Inspiration category."A sacred book of spiritual insights combined with a transformative power that transcends ordinary consciousness. Oneness in words."Written from an enlightened perspective just one day after the author's mystical death experience, it provides not just an authentic sharing of Oneness, but draws the reader towards a lasting realization that we are all part of something far greater. Encouraging conscious evolution and individual spiritual growth in understandable terms, it provides a framework for development towards the next evolutionary stage of mass consciousness for humanity.
author: J.M. Harrison
